title: A Minor Shift
description: The first in a brand new series from New York Times and USA Today Bestselling Author Tabitha Conall...  BBW shifter Eva Ross wants to climb the ranks at the FBI and she's on her way. A romance could put a huge wrench in her plans, so she turns down lion shifter and Army Ranger Bowie Garrison by telling him she's already got a date.  She didn't expect to wake the lion. Now Bowie's coming for her and it'll be all she can do to resist him... and her traitorous heart.
author: Tabitha Conall
